name: eBible.com - readability
description:
The new eBible.com site is excellent.

This stylesheet just adds some typography adjustments for readability.

Notes:
* User stylesheets sometimes need to include !important to override the styles, but should normally be avoided if possible.
* Because the site is being actively developed, this stylesheet may need frequent updates.
additional_info: Note: The use of !important is due to the styles being pulled in from userstyles.org, but should normally be avoided if possible.
